languages.text: {n}Разглядывая гвардейца, Кибелла задумчиво кивает:{/n} "Кровь психопатов горяча, а органы долго держат жар... Пригодятся в гаданиях".

traits.locale_text: [draft] {n}Разглядывая гвардейца, как кусок синтмяса на прилавке, Кибелла задумчиво кивает:{/n} "Кровь психопатов горяча, а органы долго держат жар... Пригодятся".
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."
languages.original_text: {n}Разглядывая гвардейца, Кибелла задумчиво кивает:{/n} "Кровь психопатов горяча, а органы долго держат жар... Пригодятся в гаданиях".

traits.locale_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "A madman's blood is hot, and his organs stay heated longer... Useful for divinations."

languages.text: {n}Nach der Untersuchung des Soldaten nickt Kibellah nachdenklich.{/n} "Das Blut eines Wahnsinnigen ist heiß, und seine Organe bleiben länger warm ... Nützlich für Prophetie."
languages.original_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach der Untersuchung des Soldaten nickt Kibellah nachdenklich.{/n} "Das Blut eines Wahnsinnigen ist heiß, und seine Organe bleiben länger warm ... Nützlich für Prophetie."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir examiné le garde impérial, Kibellah approuve d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Le sang d'un fou est particulièrement chaud et ses organes restent à température plus longtemps... Ce sera idéal pour la divination. »
languages.original_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir examiné le garde impérial, Kibellah approuve d'un hochement de tête.{/n} « Le sang d'un fou est particulièrement chaud et ses organes restent à température plus longtemps... Ce sera idéal pour la divination. »

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈看着眼前的帝国卫队士兵，若有所思地点了点头。{/n}“疯子的血是热的，器官也能在更长时间内保持温热状态……这对占卜很有帮助。”
languages.original_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈看着眼前的帝国卫队士兵，若有所思地点了点头。{/n}“疯子的血是热的，器官也能在更长时间内保持温热状态……这对占卜很有帮助。”

languages.text: {n}Después de examinar al Guardia, Kibellah asiente, pensativa.{/n} «La sangre de los locos está caliente y sus órganos conservan el calor durante más tiempo... Eso es útil para la adivinación».
languages.original_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}Después de examinar al Guardia, Kibellah asiente, pensativa.{/n} «La sangre de los locos está caliente y sus órganos conservan el calor durante más tiempo... Eso es útil para la adivinación».

languages.text: {n}ガーズマンを調べ終えたキベラは、考え込むようにうなずいた。{/n}「狂人の血は熱く、その臓器は長く暖かさを保つ…占いには役立つな」
languages.original_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."

traits.locale_text: {n}ガーズマンを調べ終えたキベラは、考え込むようにうなずいた。{/n}「狂人の血は熱く、その臓器は長く暖かさを保つ…占いには役立つな」

languages.text: {n}Muhafız'ı inceledikten sonra Kibellah, düşünceli bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Delinin kanı sıcaktır ve organları daha uzun süre sıcak kalır... Kehanetler için kullanışlı."
languages.original_text: {n}After examining the Guardsman, Kibellah gives a thoughtful nod.{/n} "The blood of a madman is hot, and his organs stay warm for longer... Useful for divinations."
